configFileTemplateContent:
<#if source_name?has_content>apiVersion: 1
deleteDatasources:
  - name: ${source_name}
    orgId: 1
datasources:
- name: ${source_name}
  type: prometheus
  access: proxy
  orgId: 1
  url: "http://${source_addr}",
  basicAuth: false
  isDefault: true
  version: 1
  editable: true</#if>
